tag.name: C10 f03 kubernetes configmap/C10 f03 s001 check configmap

test-group.name: [1] {configmap_name=auth-config, ACC=, k8s=, suite=, tags=relase:2017-07, Test Type: Kube-API}

test-step.description: Given a CD system is up
When I check the status of configmap {auth-config} under namespace "itsma1"
Then I get the configmap {auth-config} exists
